std_change_template.name: End-of-Life Server Equipment Management
std_change_template.template: short_description=Managing EOL servers by decommissioning and replacing outdated equipment to ensure security.^description=Managing end-of-life (EOL) servers involves identifying outdated equipment and ensuring secure decommissioning and replacement to maintain system performance and security.^implementation_plan=Inventory Assessment: Identify servers nearing EOL through a detailed review. Risk Evaluation: Assess operational and security risks linked to EOL servers. Replacement Plan: Schedule replacements or release EOL servers for SCZ Users. Decommissioning: Release machines via pipeline for 5 days, then allocate to a specific target. Monitoring: Collect all EOL servers and send them to DCops based on vCenter data.^backout_plan=No blackout plan^test_plan=No test needed^EQ
